text: Sadly the modern way of not responding is the way to go. If our team would act like that we would have a lot of fun (interpret as you wish). I still am under the impression that Microsoft would be better off offering a basic OS that is stable and has reasonable security built in instead of crap-loading everything with bloatware that they think an enterprise could need. Make it an option I say and everything would be much nicer. Markus Am 16/10/2023 um 23:59 schrieb 'Benedetti White,Arthur D (BPA) - JNPS-2' via PatchManagement: %40univie.ac.at

metadata.topic: RE: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings.
